attributes.action: permanently forbid the transmission of hard-core pornography on television; whether by paid subscription or otherwise
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Some people campaign for such material to be on our televisions on the following grounds: 

1) it would give viewers more personal choice but even soft-core pornography, let alone hard-core, can lead to rape; what about the "personal choice" of (mostly) women not to suffer this appalling crime?!  (The reason I say pornography can lead to rape is that it presents (again mostly) women as sex objects; i.e. objects to be used for sex in the same way as this computer is currently being used as an object to create this petition).

2) It would, apparently, lead to a more grown-up attitude to sexual entertainment; what's entertaining about seeing someone being exploited for various appalling sexual acts?  And it seems the REVERSE of "grown-up" to want to see such images.

3) Apparently soft-core pornography falls short of what responsible adults want to see; if they're THAT responsible shouldn't they consider the possible CONSEQUENCES of viewing such horrendous images?

I personally am opposed even to "soft-core" pornography since even that seems to me to degrade and endanger women. And I am TOTALLY opposed to ANY extension to hard-core.
